user_input: Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios for Netherlands (NL). Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2040. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. Use Hydrogen as the complement not the carrier. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for Netherlands (NL) for TYNDP 2026 scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE for year 2040, with nodes split and Hydrogen used as the complement (not the carrier).
